<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=9" />
<trait label="Fiend" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=70" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #151: The Show Must Go On](/Sources.aspx?ID=21) pg. 43</row>

**Perception** +9; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), [scent](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=33) ([imprecise](/Rules.aspx?ID=412)) 30 feet

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +8, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +10, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +8, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +8, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +9

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +5

**Dex** +3

**Con** +2

**Int** -4

**Wis** +2

**Cha** -1
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 18 

**Fort** +11 

**Ref** +9 

**Will** +7 

</row>

**HP** 50

**Resistances**
[electricity](/Traits.aspx?ID=56) 5, [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126) 5

**Weaknesses**
good 3

**[Attack of Opportunity](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=3)** <actions string="Reaction" /> 

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 30 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +12,
**Damage** 1d8+5 piercing plus [Knockdown](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=20)

**Aggressive Rush** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Move](/Traits.aspx?ID=114)) The blood wolf moves up to half its Speed. This movement doesn't trigger reactions. At the end of the movement, it attempts an [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) check to [Demoralize](/Actions.aspx?ID=53) a target within 5 feet of it. This Intimidation check doesn't take the –4 circumstance penalty for the wolf not speaking a language.

**Pack Attack**   The blood wolf's Strikes deal an extra 1d6 damage to creatures within reach of at least two of the wolf's allies.

</column>
